name: pnp-uninstall-package
title: Uninstall .sppkg package from the specified app catalog
shortDescription: This script is to uninstall .sppkg package from the tenant or site collection app catalog.
longDescription: The purpose of this script is to uninstall .sppkg package from the specified app catalog. It is primarily used during development after executing the 'gulp package-solution' command. If the package name is not provided as a parameter, the script automatically detects and removes the package based on the project structure. To remove a package from the site collection app catalog, use this script in conjunction with the '-appCatalogUrl' parameter.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
